item.title: One Year of JasperFx Software
item.description: After about 25 years or so in the software industry, I finally founded my own business named JasperFx Software last year at about this time with the general strategy of building a services and product company around the “Critter Stack” tools (Marten, Wolverine, Weasel, and soon to be some others) as well as any or … Continue reading One Year of JasperFx Software → Link to article: https://jeremydmiller.com/2024/05/28/one-year-of-jasperfx-software/
